name: God Eater Off Shot: Sakuya-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 7
name_original: God Eater Off Shot: Sakuya-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 7
description:
God Eater Off Shot: Sakuya-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 7 is an arcade game. It came out on 21-04-2016. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
God Eater Off Shot: Sakuya-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 7 is available on PlayStation 4.
